title: Calories in In-N-Out Fries
meta_description: Learn fries calories in n out for a standard serving, plus carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks to customize your order.
assumptions: Standard order of French Fries from In-N-Out Burger, made from fresh-cut potatoes, cooked in cholesterol-free vegetable oil; no added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, portion size, cooking oil batch, and customizations. Check In-N-Out app or menu for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One serving of In-N-Out fries contains ~395 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Animal style (add cheese, grilled onions, spread)

faqs.q: How many calories are in In-N-Out fries?
faqs.a: A standard serving has about 395 calories.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in fries calories in n out?
faqs.a: Around 54 g of carbs per serving, with 5 g fiber.

faqs.q: Are In-N-Out fries high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 260 mg sodium per serving from the seasoning.

faqs.q: Do In-N-Out fries have trans fats?
faqs.a: No trans fats; cooked in cholesterol-free vegetable oil.

faqs.q: How does animal style affect fries calories in n out?
faqs.a: Adds ~170 kcal from cheese and toppings, totaling 565 kcal.
